tracks.title: General Track
tracks.description: If you already have an idea in mind or want to create a project that doesn't fall under one of our tracks, our General Track is for you!

tracks.title: Learners Track
tracks.description: First-time coders with no technical experience have the opportunity to learn coding basics and be able to compete against other first-time hackers for prizes. This track is specifically for people who have never coded before!
